content:
Yes, there is a mobile app called "CATS Pass" that you can use to plan your route and get real-time information about the schedules of Charlotte's bus and light rail services. This app is available for both iOS and Android devices and can be downloaded for free from the App Store or Google Play.

CATS Pass app provides information on bus and light rail arrival times, route maps, fares, and service alerts. You can also purchase and store CATS transit passes directly within the app for convenient travel.

Additionally, the app supports multiple languages and has accessibility features for those with visual or hearing impairments. It’s a useful tool for navigating Charlotte's public transportation system.
